DOC.criteria: GDM Group : GDM diagnosis base International Association Diabetes Pregnancy Study Group ( IADPSG ) WHO , Hyperglycemia Adverse Pregnancy Outcomes ( HAPO ) study ( 2 h 75 g oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) : fast glucose ≥ 92 mg/dl one hour result ≥ 80 mg/dl , two hour result ≥ 153 mg/dl ; Control Group : Normal glucose tolerance ( IADPSG /WHO ) Aging 18 35 year ; Physically inactive ( < 150 ` per week base International Physical Activity Questionnaire .
